column1: ;The required header row fields are: SKU

;SKU: Unique,alphanumeric (may or may not contain special characters) The sku (Stock Keeping Unit) is a unique name for your product. The sku must be labeled on your product for the Fulfillment Centre to easily identify it.
;Make available on: Enter the name of the sales channel on which you want to make the product available. In case of multiple channels use ; to seperate the channel name.
;Make unavailable on: Enter the name of the sales channel on which you want to make the product unavailable. In case of multiple channels use ; to seperate the channel name.
;Custom Field: Use custom field internal name as the header to define the value in the cvs. Use custom field value as the value to define the custom field. (Example, Internal name: Color, Value: Red)

;Make sure you have custom fields already created as per the below mapping in case you want to make any product available. These custom fields are required to make a product. Available on respected channel.
